meanings.definition: A person who applies a thin decorative covering to something.
meanings.sent1: The veneerers carefully added a shiny layer to the table.
meanings.sent2: The furniture company hired skilled veneerers to beautify their products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous veneerers decided to cover the entire room in glittery paper.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like veneerers, hiding their true feelings under a polished surface.
meanings.sent5: The veneerers transformed the plain cabinet into a work of art with their expertise.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who give a false appearance or impression.
meanings.sent1: The veneerers in the movie industry created illusions for the audience.
meanings.sent2: The politician's team were skilled veneerers, always presenting a flawless image.
meanings.sent3: The group of veneerers pretended to be aliens to prank their friends.
meanings.sent4: Their smiles were like veneerers, hiding their true emotions behind a facade.
meanings.sent5: The veneerers at the event made everything seem perfect, but reality was different.
